channel.title: Posts on The proverbial fork.
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on The proverbial fork.

item.title: Day 0.
item.description: I am simulatesously on a path to self-destruction and seeking professionals to stop me acheiving that end. I have long known it is in my power to bring forward my unknown yet inevitable expiry; is it possible to push it back, I wonder?
item.content: I am simulatesously on a path to self-destruction and seeking professionals to stop me acheiving that end. I have long known it is in my power to bring forward my unknown yet inevitable expiry; is it possible to push it back, I wonder?
